briefTitle: MYL-1402O Compared With Avastin速, in Patients With Stage IV nsNSCLC
officialTitle: Multicenter, Double-Blind, Randomized, Parallel-Group Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of MYL-1402O Compared With Avastin速, in the First-line Treatment of Patients With Stage IV Non-Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
summary: Assess the Efficacy and Safety of MYL-1402O Compared with Avastin速, in the First-line Treatment of Patients with Stage IV Non-Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer

primaryOutcome.measure: Primary Efficacy Analysis of Overall Response Rate ( ORR) of MYL-1402O as Compared to Avastin
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 18 weeks after first dosing per patient
